mapper.select: select * from crowdmemberRole cmr left join (select id as uid , msg from Member) m on cmr.id where m.uid = cmr.memberId and cmr.crowdId = 5 and 2 >= cmr.groupRole
select * from Board left join (select boardId, title, content, writerId, regDate, hit from Posts)post on post.boardId = id where crowdId = 5
